title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, I am unable to select any item for the first time.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline.

Observed behavior: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.

Expected behavior: When I select an item in the library outline view, the focus should remain on the selected item and not jump to the library file node.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline.
